div.p: The Wilson Spot will be serving meals for the next 2 weeks during the week (Monday-Friday) Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner will be served.
Visit their website www.thewilsonspot.org where you can register and provide your details and pick up meals, etc.
If you do not have internet access, call them at 252-991-4018.
